name: Escapada V3
description:
1. Hello and welcome to Escapada. Escapada is a 2d offline platformer game where you need to complete the levels and then save your coins and buy awesome perks to go thorugh the levels easier and faster!
  2. Yes, you need to grind at first but after you do it for a little, it will get better and better
  3. Escapada id preety new so until i finish it there might a few bugs
